step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
Your elbow position was a bit high in this step. Try to keep it slightly lower as you make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades.
You're doing well making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good work!
This step seems to be a repeat of step 4. Ensure you are following the distinct actions for each step. Relaxing is key here.
Starting the second rep well, maintaining a comfortable posture and arm stretch.
Your elbows were a little high again. Focus on keeping them lower while making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Good effort making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale and engage your muscles during this part.
Excellent work stretching your arms overhead and exhaling. You're performing the movement well.
This step is for relaxing and stretching arms overhead. Ensure you are fully exhaling and releasing tension.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows slightly lower during the fist-making phase and ensure you're fully exhaling when stretching your arms overhead. This will help maximize the benefits for lymph drainage and arm strength.
